OOC: Woot that time again this is some simulation type thing now. One 
catch what happens there, happens to Blacknightmare... hellpeon still 
is fighting Ultimo. Now without further ado... the evil that happens 
when one makes the wrong choice. The right choice was Orchestra, 
simply because it was the only choice there she had knowledge about. 
Hellpeon was the wrong choice because opposing the Bamphomet is a bad 
thing... and the other guy... well thats the "Bamphomet" extremely 
small sized. He was the wrong answer because although your not 
supposed to disobey him he doesnt want to take over the universe. 
Orchestra was the correct answer because it was the only one she knew 
and it displayed Infecticon beliefs. You destroy a race, you salvage 
whats left of the technology that would benefit you and move on.

As Blackknightmare walked towards the Chamber, all the other 
Holograms dissapeared. A moment later the floor beneath her opened 
and she dropped into a chamber, the entrance sealing up. A  right 
light shown all around and then suddenly she found herself standing 
on what looked to be an asteroid in front of what appears to be 
Hellpeon. A moment later a very and all too real blast of chaochitan 
energy.

Weird simulation type hellpeon: "Predacon trash!"

Elsewhere Blight looks to Darkfate and smirks as he steps away from 
him and soon a barrier of chaochitan energy flys in front and to the 
sides of Darkfate.

Blight: "Slight change of plans... I decided not to have you killed. 
You would be better as a prisoner. Now your troops will work for us 
or you shall die. Forget about recieving and sending coms as well. 
The energy hear "kills them off.""


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> BLacknightmare::
> 
> 
> "Orchestra???"said Blacknightmare when the hologram placed a hand 
in 
> her face, she walked some steps and stopped "No... I can't let my 
> feelings manage me now" thought the femme and looked to holograms, 
> she come back to her pedestal "Well at whom will I choose?" thought 
> Blacknightmare"I should think... Carefully"
> 
> Darkfate frowned and thought"I should speak with her... later"
> 
> Blacknightmare started to walk and she walked towards Hellpeon's 
> hologram. 
> 
> She stopped and waited that chamber open in order to enter. "Why 
> me?"thought the femme"I didn't do anything"
